duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare, review, and analyze financial statements, ensuring accuracy and compliance with Generally Accepted Accounting Principles.
Maintain balance sheet and inventory reconciliations, journal entries, accruals, and adjustments; analyze financial data to identify trends, variances, and potential areas for improvement.
Participate in month-end and year-end closing processes, including preparing necessary reconciliations and supporting schedules.
Assist in financial analysis by providing insights into key performance indicators, variances, and financial trends.
Provide direction to Accounting staff and support development of policies, controls, systems, and financial studies of matters of importance.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Accounting or Finance preferred (Master's preferred)
